header_title: Prepare for your Canadian citizenship test
header_description: The test will ask questions about the rights and responsibilities of Canadian citizens, Canadaâ€™s history, geography, economy, government, laws, and symbols. It has 20 questions that are either multiple choice or true or false. The test is available in English or French and is 45 minutes long. You need to get at least 15 out of 20 questions right to pass the test.
